findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can withdraw reward tokens.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to withdraw reward tokens, which may lead to unauthorized token withdrawal.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can recover wrong tokens.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to recover wrong tokens.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can stop reward.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to stop rewards, which could potentially lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can change pool limit per user value
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to modify the pool limit per user value, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can change reward per block.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to modify the reward per block, which could lead to unintended consequences or exploitation.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can change deposit fee.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to change the deposit fee, which could lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can withdraw fees.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable contract has the privilege to withdraw fees, which could lead to unauthorized access and manipulation of funds.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can change start and end blocks.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to modify start and end blocks, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can change stakedTokenTransferFee
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to change the staked token transfer fee.

findings.title: SwapBoxInitializable Owner can change withdrawal interval.
findings.description: The owner of SwapBoxInitializable has the privilege to change the withdrawal interval.

findings.title: Owner can deploy pools.
findings.description: The owner of the SwapBoxFactory contract has the privilege to deploy pools, which may lead to unintended consequences or security risks if not properly managed.

findings.title: Insufficient Balance of Reward Token
findings.description: SwapBoxInitializable reward token must have a non-empty balance at the SwapBoxInitializable address to enable reward payments.
